longDescription:
Robust Storage and Smooth Operations Experience seamless performance with the powerful combination of 12GB LPDDR4 RAM and a rapid 512GB SSD. Effortlessly manage multiple applications and multimedia tasks, with the option to expand storage via the TF card slot supporting up to 1TB expansion.

Processor Intel Celeron N5095 (Clock Speed: up to 2.9 GHz)

Portable and Versatile Connectivity Weighing just 1.7kg and measuring 20mm thin, this ultra-thin laptop offers convenient portability. Enjoy versatile connectivity options, including Bluetooth 4.2, dual-band WiFi, Mini HDMI, USB 3.2 Gen1 ports, Type-C port, headphone jack, Micro TF slot, and a long-lasting 7.6V/5000mWh battery, catering to all your connectivity needs.
